data.message:
from 3 thousand miles away, You have kept my friendship alive.
Thank you facebook. :)

replies.message: Hey Jedidiah, we'd be happy to hear more about your long-distance friendship if you'd like to share with us here: https://www.facebookstories.com/yourstory

Alexis Leader and i have unique history and ill gladly tell on tomorrow when i am at a pc! but shes been my best friend my reality check and my hero for years.. i cant say where i would be right now if she hadnt come into my life, and stayed in it despite the distance.. Im tryingto plan a trip out there to say hi and thank you to her...
